channel.title: Portforwarding.. lol
channel.description: I am currently attempting to portforward my server. Im using allstar as a base, and the nulls are fixed, etc. I changed the clients ip, compiled, etc.. I let The TCP 43594 into my firewall, as a exception, i portforwarded through my router with 43594 as a TCP, I downloaded the no-ip duc and made a host. I even tried utorrents method. I always check the port, and it says it closed. I used canyouseeme.org. I can connect through my local ip though... Any suggestions/help would be nice. With Regards, David. (Also, i already tried static ip.) (Help would be nice.) Hope im not the only one, no one helped me in server help.. so

It’s a very helpful tool whilst portforwarding. If you want I can put up a link here to a video that can help you.
